title: Encodings
description: Custom [level-codec] compatible encodings for use with [encoding-down].

charwise.description: Encode/decode with same encoded sort order as [bytewise].

description: Binary serialization which sorts bytewise for arbitrarily complex data structures.
NB. Use [charwise] if possible. Gives you almost everything `bytewise` does but much faster.

protocol-buffers.description: [Protocol Buffers](https://developers.google.com/protocol-buffers/) for Node.js. Compiled messages are [level-codec] compatible encodings.
